about: I was very addicted to opening cases

caseNumber.title: Possible cases

casePrice.desc: Calculate how expensive the case can be if you know the amount you want to open and your bankroll
casePrice.title: Maximum case price

total.desc: Calculate how much money you need to open a certain amount of cases with a certain price
total.title: Needed money

faq: What is the meaning of life?

landing.desc: Explore the probabilities and calculate your case openings. Good luck and have fun discovering!
landing.feat1: Determine how many cases you can open with your bankroll
landing.feat2: Find out the cost of opening a specific number of cases at a given price
landing.feat3: Check out the maximum case price based on your budget
landing.feat4: Explore probabilities to draw certain items from a case
landing.feat5: Are you lucky today? Simulate a case opnenings
landing.title: Welcome to case calc!

rarity.desc: There are 5 kinds of items you can get from a normal case

keyprice.desc: Set the keyprice in your country

keyprice.title: Key Price
